headline: West Pharmaceutical Services (WST) is Returning to Sustainable Volume Growth
summary: Conestoga Capital Advisors, an asset management company, released its fourth-quarter 2025 investor letter. A copy of the letter can be downloaded here. In Q4 2025, Conestoga Capital Advisors Mid Cap Strategy returned -5.75% net of fees compared to the Russell Midcap Growth Index’s -3.70% return. The underperformance was driven by negative stock selection in the Technology […]

headline: Are Wall Street Analysts Bullish on West Pharmaceutical Services Stock?
summary: West Pharmaceutical Services has outperformed the broader market over the past year, and analysts are highly optimistic about the stock’s prospects.
